item.title: PowerShell Profile & Functions
item.description: Until starting my current position, I had been a pretty strict Mac OS user. As one can expect from a job in the public sector however, I quickly had to face the reality of full-time Windows use, which I had successfully avoided since my days as a high school student with a laptop that barely ran Vista. While initially hesitant, I’ve become gradually more accustomed to and fond of the Windows environment – even running Windows 10 as the primary operating system on my desktop at home.
